title: hi, im new..
body:
hey, im very new to LoL and really want to get into it.

I was just looking for someone to help me with the game as a whole. 

thanks!

replies.body:
Add me bud let's play a few games :)

League is a fun game and with a lil guidance you're gonna be kicking some ass!

Add me I'm on NA
Did you need help installing League or were you looking for people to play with you and show you the ropes?
